snippet: In an interview with Time magazine, President Viktor F. Yanukovich says he wants to release former Prime Minister Yulia V. Tymoshenko, but “can’t act outside the framework of the law.”
abstract: Ukraine Pres Viktor F Yanukovich, in an interview with Time magazine, says he wants to release former prime minister Yulia V Tymoshenko from prison, but does not have the legal authority to do so.
lead_paragraph: In an interview with Time magazine, President Viktor F. Yanukovich says he wants to release former Prime Minister Yulia V. Tymoshenko, but “can’t act outside the framework of the law.”

headline.seo: Ukraine’s President Says He Has No Authority to Pardon Tymoshenko
headline.main: Ukraine’s President Says He Has No Authority to Pardon Jailed Rival
